Room.Name: Garden Circle Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the east side of Garden Circle Road.
Room.LongDescription: The sound of small animals and birds can be heard from the trees and ferns in the famous Gardens. There is a story that there is a mirror pool located in the Garden, but that only the pure of heart can ever see it. At one time the citizens of the old realm suggested that evil-doers be brought there to administer justice, but unfortunately the judges could never find the pool.
